00026 W.toString = function(isDebug){
00027     return this.serialize(this, false);

00031 W.serialize = function(obj, isDebug){
00032   if(!isDebug) isDebug = false;
00033   var lineBreak = '';
00034   var tab = '';
00035   if(isDebug){
00036     lineBreak = '\n';
00037     tab = '    ';
00038   }
00039   var str = '{'+ lineBreak;
00040   var first = true;
00041   for(var i in obj){
00042     if(first){
00043       first = false;
00044     }else str += ','+ lineBreak;
00045     str += tab + i +':';
00046     switch(typeof obj[i]){
00047       case 'string':
00048         str += '"'+ obj[i] +'"';
00049         break;
00050       case 'function':
00051         // special treatment for backslash writing
00052         if(i == 'js'){
00053             //str += 'function(url){document.write("<script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\""+ url +"\"><\\/script>");}';
00054             str += 'function(url){document.write("<script type=\'text/javascript\' src=\'"+ url +"\'><\\/script>");}';
00055             break;
00056         }
00057         var s = '';
00058         s += obj[i];
00059         s = s.replace(/\s+/g, " ");
00060         s = s.replace(/^\s(.*)/, "$1");
00061         s = s.replace(/(.*)\s$/, "$1");
00062         s = s.replace(/\s([\x21\x25\x26\x28\x29\x2a\x2b\x2c\x2d\x2f\x3a\x3b\x3c\x3d\x3e\x3f\x5b\x5d\x5c\x7b\x7c\x7d\x7e])/g, "$1");
00063         str += s.replace(/([\x21\x25\x26\x28\x29\x2a\x2b\x2c\x2d\x2f\x3a\x3b\x3c\x3d\x3e\x3f\x5b\x5d\x5c\x7b\x7c\x7d\x7e])\s/g, "$1");
00064         break;
00065       case 'object':
00066         str += W.json.stringify(obj[i]);
00067         break;
00068       default:
00069         str += obj[i];
00070     }
00071   }
00072   return str + lineBreak +'}';
00073 };

00075 
00076 W.removeComments = function(s) {
00077   var lines, i, t;
00078   // Remove '//' comments from each line.
00079   lines = s.split("\n");
00080   t = "";
00081   for (i = 0; i < lines.length; i++)
00082     t += lines[i].replace(/([^\x2f]*)\x2f\x2f.*$/, "$1");
00083   // Replace newline characters with spaces.
00084   t = t.replace(/(.*)\n(.*)/g, "$1 $2");
00085   // Remove '/* ... */' comments.
00086   lines = t.split("*/");
00087   t = "";
00088   for (i = 0; i < lines.length; i++)
00089     t += lines[i].replace(/(.*)\x2f\x2a(.*)$/g, "$1 ");
00090   return t;
00091 };

00115 /*
00116     The global object JSON contains two methods.
00117 
00118     JSON.stringify(value) takes a JavaScript value and produces a JSON text.
00119     The value must not be cyclical.
00120 
00121     JSON.parse(text) takes a JSON text and produces a JavaScript value. It will
00122     return false if there is an error.
00123 */
00124 W.json = function () {
00125     var m = {
00126             '\b': '\\b',
00127             '\t': '\\t',
00128             '\n': '\\n',
00129             '\f': '\\f',
00130             '\r': '\\r',
00131             '"' : '\\"',
00132             '\\': '\\\\'
00133         },
00134         s = {
00135             'boolean': function (x) {
00136                 return String(x);
00137             },
00138             number: function (x) {
00139                 return isFinite(x) ? String(x) : 'null';
00140             },
00141             string: function (x) {
00142                 if (/["\\\x00-\x1f]/.test(x)) {
00143                     x = x.replace(/([\x00-\x1f\\"])/g, function(a, b) {
00144                         var c = m[b];
00145                         if (c) {
00146                             return c;
00147                         }
00148                         c = b.charCodeAt();
00149                         return '\\u00' +
00150                             Math.floor(c / 16).toString(16) +
00151                             (c % 16).toString(16);
00152                     });
00153                 }
00154                 return '"' + x + '"';
00155             },
00156             object: function (x) {
00157                 if (x) {
00158                     var a = [], b, f, i, l, v;
00159                     if (x instanceof Array) {
00160                         a[0] = '[';
00161                         l = x.length;
00162                         for (i = 0; i < l; i += 1) {
00163                             v = x[i];
00164                             f = s[typeof v];
00165                             if (f) {
00166                                 v = f(v);
00167                                 if (typeof v == 'string') {
00168                                     if (b) {
00169                                         a[a.length] = ',';
00170                                     }
00171                                     a[a.length] = v;
00172                                     b = true;
00173                                 }
00174                             }
00175                         }
00176                         a[a.length] = ']';
00177                     } else if (typeof x.hasOwnProperty === 'function') {
00178                         a[0] = '{';
00179                         for (i in x) {
00180                         /*
00181                             if (x.hasOwnProperty(i)) {
00182                                 v = x[i];
00183                                 f = s[typeof v];
00184                                 if (f) {
00185                                     v = f(v);
00186                                     if (typeof v == 'string') {
00187                                         if (b) {
00188                                             a[a.length] = ',';
00189                                         }
00190                                         a.push(s.string(i), ':', v);
00191                                         b = true;
00192                                     }
00193                                 }
00194                             }
00195                             */
00196                         }
00197                         a[a.length] = '}';
00198                     } else if(typeof x == 'object') {
00199                         a[a.length] = W.json.stringify(x);
00200                     } else {
00201                         return;
00202                     }
00203                     return a.join('');
00204                 }
00205                 return 'null';
00206             }
00207         };
00208     return {
00209         copyright: '(c)2005 JSON.org',
00210         license: 'http://www.JSON.org/license.html',
00211 /*
00212     Stringify a JavaScript value, producing a JSON text.
00213 */
00214         stringify: function (v) {
00215             var f = s[typeof v];
00216             if (f) {
00217                 v = f(v);
00218                 if (typeof v == 'string') {
00219                     return v;
00220                 }
00221             }
00222             return null;
00223         },
00224 /*
00225     Parse a JSON text, producing a JavaScript value.
00226     It returns false if there is a syntax error.
00227 */
00228         parse: function (text) {
00229             try {
00230                 return !(/[^,:{}\[\]0-9.\-+Eaeflnr-u \n\r\t]/.test(
00231                         text.replace(/"(\\.|[^"\\])*"/g, ''))) &&
00232                     eval('(' + text + ')');
00233             } catch (e) {
00234                 return false;
00235             }
00236         }
00237     };
00238 }();
